summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin Dashboard for Rushabh Ventures. All 30 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend UI tests passed including login, dashboard navigation, blog CMS create/edit, status updates, and logout functionality.
critical_code_review_comments: All admin endpoints properly protected with JWT authentication
Good use of data-testid attributes for testability
Blog slug auto-generation from title is a nice UX feature
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix during backend tests (auto-cleaned after each test)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin panel fully functional. All CRUD operations work: Contacts (list/update/delete), Applications (list/update/delete), Blog CMS (list/create/update/delete), File Manager (list/upload/delete). JWT auth with 24hr expiration. Dashboard stats endpoint provides overview data.

features_tested.admin_login_valid_credentials: PASS - Login with correct email/password redirects to dashboard
features_tested.admin_login_invalid_credentials: PASS - Invalid credentials return 401 and stay on login page
features_tested.admin_token_verification: PASS - Valid tokens verified, invalid tokens rejected
features_tested.dashboard_overview: PASS - Stats displayed (applications, contacts, blog posts, files count)
features_tested.applications_tab: PASS - Lists all applications with status filter and search
features_tested.contacts_tab: PASS - Lists all contacts with status filter and search
features_tested.blog_cms_list: PASS - Lists all blog posts with edit/delete actions
features_tested.blog_cms_create: PASS - Can create new blog post with auto-slug generation
features_tested.blog_cms_update: PASS - Can update existing blog posts
features_tested.file_manager_list: PASS - Lists uploaded files with type filter
features_tested.file_manager_upload: PASS - Can upload files (tested via API)
features_tested.admin_logout: PASS - Logout clears token and redirects to login page
